auth_switch_to_login: Already have an account? Sign in
auth_switch_to_register: Don't have an account? Register here.
auth_error_email_invalid: Please enter a valid email address.
auth_error_password_min: Your password must be at least 8 characters long.
auth_error_password_max: Your password must be at most 32 characters long.
auth/acount-exists-with-different-creden: Account already exists with a different connexion type. Try email and password, for example
auth/auth-domain-config-required: Auth domain config required. Please contact an administrator.
auth/operation-not-allowed: Operation not allowed. Please contact an administrator.
auth/operation-not-supported-in-this-env: Operation not supported in this environment. Please contact an administrator.
auth/popup-blocked: Popup blocked. Please allow popups for this website and try again.
auth/unauthorized-domain: Unauthorized domain. Please contact an administrator.
auth/email-already-in-use: Email already in use. Consider signing in instead or use a different email address.
